scope.title: Performance Assessment Call
scope.summary: The National COVID-19 Chest Imaging Database (NCCID) was created as part of the NHS AI Labs response to the coronavirus pandemic. The NCCID is currently the largest database of medical images from COVID patients in the UK, and a world-class initiative accelerating the development of AI technologies.
